response.overview: After a shipwreck, twins Viola and Sebastian, each believing the other to be dead, try to adjust to life in the city of Illyria. Viola takes a job at the court of Count Orsino, whom she loves, but accidentally wins the love of the Lady Olivia in the process. Meanwhile, members of Olivia's household attempt to teach the steward Malvolio a difficult lesson...
response.tagline: Love, loss, and life's cycle of joy and sorrow!!
response.title: Twelfth Night
